short_summary: Replace existing office chairs with ergonomic rotary chairs
description: The RCMP has a requirement for replacing existing office chairs with ergonomic rotary chairs.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Solicitation Number: M2989-2-0157

### Issued Date: September 7, 2022
### Closing Date: October 19, 2022 (17:00:00 EST)
### Amendment Date: October 14, 2022

### Contracting Entity:
Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)

#### Address:
73 Leikin Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K1A OR2
#### Country:
Canada

### End-User Entity:
Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)

#### Address:
73 Leikin Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K1A OR2
#### Country:
Canada

### Contact Information:
Kathleen Nillas, Contracting Authority
kathleen.nillas@rcmp-grc.gc.ca

### Solicitation Description:
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires the purchase, delivery, and installation of ergonomic rotary chairs to Surrey, British Columbia by March 10, 2023. This solicitation is conducted under the General Stream of the Supply Arrangement (SA) E60PQ-120001/G. The RCMP is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Eligibility Requirements:
Only pre-qualified suppliers with an issued Supply Arrangement Agreement (SAA) are eligible to bid. Non-Supply Arrangement (Non-SA) holders can submit a bid, but must also submit an arrangement to the SAA for evaluation. Non-SA holders cannot be awarded a contract unless and until the SAA has issued an SA for the products and services contained in the bid.

### Trade Agreements:
The solicitation is subject to the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### regions and Locations:
The tender involves the following region and location:
* Region: Unspecified
* Location: British Columbia

### Attachment:
[reference solicitation documents]

### Solicitation Documents:
A copy of the solicitation document can be downloaded from the Canada Buy and Sell website (https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders). Inquires regarding the solicitation should be directed to the Contracting Authority. Suppliers wishing to become pre-qualified suppliers are encouraged to contact RCNAmeublement.NCRFurniture@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.  Please excuse any potential typos as I had to reformat quite a bit.
